This course is the best among English minor. The professor uses various kinds of reading material to cultivate students' interest in reading. I really love the way the professor teach! Thank you so much! It's my pleasure to be in your class
The professor is a warm person.

教授所選的短文都恨有趣~
不過希望文本分析的部分可以再深入一些

Although the time spent on assignment and quiz each week is quite long, the workload actually cultivates my reading habit and strengthen my comprehension ability. Also, the teacher is humorous and friendly.
Though the reading contents were interesting, there were too many quizzes. Hope the teacher can alter the way of testing.

I like your lecture very much! You are the best teacher of all the courses of English Minor. I especially like the part of you interpreting the reading selection, and I hope this part can be more in the class.
整體來說，學期前半段的功課量偏重，也可能是因為我很認真地找文章，為了要符合單字量的部分常常要花費一小時多找到適當的文本，完成作業往往要花上三小時，再加上考試分量其實多又重，三學分的課真的被我當六學分在修。希望老師在考文本的考試給我們附錄的word時，可以過濾一下單字，不然有時候總共70個單字只考15個英譯其實背不太起來也沒有效率。
This class surly inspired me to read more different kinds of short stories written by authors from different culture; moreover, try find out the points that the stories can bring to us.
